meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Bob Boed Yvonne Buchanan Bruce Fauman Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #126.

td.p: Bob Boed, an attorney from Arlington, Virginia
Yvonne Buchanan, an administrative clerk originally from Phoenix, Arizona
Bruce Fauman, a university administrator and professor from Vancouver, British Columbia (whose 2-day cash winnings total $17,399)

tr.td: U.S. GEOGRAPHY
PEOPLE
WORD ORIGINS
MAMMALS
WEIGHTS & MEASURES
HOWDY DOODY
